name: The Cinema Rosa (DEMO)
description:
-- The Cinema Rosa is an immersive PC and Mac exploration game set in an abandoned cinema--

The Cinema Rosa is a narrative-driven first person adventure that sees you exploring an abandoned art deco cinema, solving puzzles & unraveling a story of loss, romance, nostalgia and regret.

You take on the role of a protagonist exploring his past through various personal demons. As you explore, you encounter various notes, objects and puzzles that you can interact with, reconstructing the cinema to its former glory days.

The game is set for release in early 2019 on PC, Mac and Occulus.
